name: Minesweeper
desc: I developed a Minesweeper game using Java and the Swing library, enabling users to interact with a graphical interface to reveal nearby bombs and flag potential danger zones. To enhance gameplay efficiency, I implemented a Depth-First Search (DFS) algorithm that automatically cascades the reveal of adjacent empty cells when a user clicks on a safe square. Throughout the project, I utilized technologies such as Java, Swing, and Git for development and version control.
